Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet

Contains the parameter objects and the top level user interface and examples for the Fracplanet port.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AllFracplanetParameters Bundles up all the parameters that the program deals with so they can easily be saved etc.
CameraPositionParameters Object that holds the camera position list
CloudParameters Bean object that represents the cloud parameters
ExportParameters Parameters related to file exporting
GLTerrainViewer Test of the GL terrain viewer
MeshStats Some stats on a mesh for display in the program.
RenderParameters Holds the set of options that affect rendering
TerrainExample Example that shows how to use the terrain generator to make a terrain mesh without having the viewer / Swing / JOGL etc.
TerrainParameters Controllable parameters for terrain generation
 

Enum Summary
TerrainParameters.ObjectTypeEnum Enumeration describing the type of terrain
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet Description

Contains the parameter objects and the top level user interface and examples for the Fracplanet port.

Related Documentation

The original C version of Fracplanet can be found here:
  • bottlenose.demon.co.uk/share/fracplanet/index.htm
